title: Holistic Living

Increase the chances of avoiding chronic conditions, and find alternative ways to improve your overall health. APP FEATURES...
cleaned_text: Holistic Living 4+ Holistic Lifestyle & Remedies [ Netus LLC ](https://apps.apple.com/us/developer/netus-llc/id1452110967) Designed for iPad - - Free Screenshots Description How you architect your health is important - diet change, using various anti inflammatory herbs, natural products and lifestyle change plays a big role in a preventive care. Increase the chances of avoiding chronic conditions, and find alternative ways to improve your overall health. APP FEATURES - Explore non-pharma options to promote your health - Selection of herbs with their commonly known names and medicinal properties. - Healthy recipes - Small tips and tricks for every day - Shop for sustainable, healthy products - Daily checklist to help you build a healthy routine and stick to it - Find a Specialist or a coach to help you improve wellness, or assist you reaching your goals What's New Version 1.2.1 We added new features (book a specialist, better navigation, health goals, better daily tracking), new branding and minor bug fixes. Ratings and Reviews Great Herbal Resources If you are looking for something in your kitchen that might help your heartburn, sleep better, or for upset stomach Natural Living is a must have! We need to stop reaching out to drugs for everything. The best What's unique about this way of living is you observe everything as a whole and this app can help you with that So much helpful information The app is packed with great information and easy to navigate! App Privacy The developer, Netus LLC, indicated that the app's privacy practices may include handling of data as described below. For more information, see the [developer's privacy policy](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/5f26f172445a0dc1af736d02/5fb2a9ae6744e91ba9c68cbd_Privacy%20Policy.pdf). Data Not Linked to You The following data may be collected but it is not linked to your identity: - Contact Info - Diagnostics Privacy practices may vary, for example, based on the features you use or your age. [Learn More](https://apps.apple.com/story/id1538632801) Information - Seller - Netus LLC - Size - 64.6 MB - Category - [Health & Fitness](https://itunes.apple.com/us/genre/id6013) - Compatibility - - iPhone - Requires iOS 10.0 or later. - iPad - Requires iPadOS 10.0 or later. - iPod touch - Requires iOS 10.0 or later. - Mac - Requires macOS 11.0 or later and a Mac with Apple M1 chip or later. - Languages - English - Age Rating - 4+ - Copyright - © Netus LLC - Price - Free
